amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting a substantial increase in the minimum wage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 881 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 93.

action.text: Amendment SA 881 proposed by Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S1982, S1983, S1983-1984; text: CR S1982) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting a substantial increase in the minimum wage.
